name: part_007
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Seiza ni naretara' by 3rd Generation Girls Band.
Narrative sequence showing the band's growth, including practice sessions and humorous arguments.
Performance of the song 'Tenitai Kansoku' at a large outdoor stadium concert.

subtitles.original: どんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright it is

subtitles.original: まっすぐ 時計は ８時
subtitles.english: The clock is straight at 8 o'clock

subtitles.original: 夜空に待ってんの　星
subtitles.english: Stars waiting in the night sky

subtitles.original: 何光年離れたところには
subtitles.english: Millions of light-years away

subtitles.original: もう無いかもしれない
subtitles.english: They might not even be there anymore

subtitles.original: 月が嫌いで 泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I hate the moon and feel like crying

subtitles.original: いつの日にか 別れが来るから
subtitles.english: Is because one day, we'll have to part

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 彗星みたいな流れる独り言
subtitles.english: A flowing monologue like a comet

subtitles.original: 消えてゆく残像は 真夜中のプリズム
subtitles.english: The fading afterimage is a midnight prism

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 切なる願いが誰かに届いたら
subtitles.english: If my earnest wish reached someone

subtitles.original: 変われるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can change

subtitles.original: 夜の淵をなぞるような こんな僕でも
subtitles.english: Even someone like me who traces the edge of the night

subtitles.original: はるか彼方 僕ら出会ってしまった
subtitles.english: In the far distance, we happened to meet

subtitles.original: カルマだから 何度も出会ってしまうよ
subtitles.english: Because it's karma, we'll meet again and again

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間で
subtitles.english: Between the gaps of the clouds

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 夜広げて描こうよ空言
subtitles.english: Let's spread out the night and draw fabrications

subtitles.original: 暗闇を照らすような 満月じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's not a full moon that lights up the darkness

subtitles.original: だから集まって星座になりたい
subtitles.english: That's why I want us to gather and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 色とりどりの光放つような
subtitles.english: One that emits multicolored lights

subtitles.original: 繋いだ線　解かないよ
subtitles.english: I won't let go of the connected lines

subtitles.original: 君がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright you are

subtitles.original: 無事にメジャーデビューし 羽ばたく4人
subtitles.english: Successfully making their major debut, the four take flight

subtitles.original: 時に支え合い
subtitles.english: Supporting each other at times

subtitles.original: あ、ここは、からの、こう、こう
subtitles.english: Ah, from here, then, like this, and this

subtitles.original: あー、OK OK
subtitles.english: Ah, okay okay

subtitles.original: いい、いい、いい
subtitles.english: Good, good, good

subtitles.original: せーの、で！
subtitles.english: Ready, go!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、船長は...
subtitles.english: Then, the Captain will...

subtitles.original: 大丈夫！？
subtitles.english: Are you okay!?

subtitles.original: 時にケンカし
subtitles.english: Quarreling at times

subtitles.original: 見てフレア、ちゃんと、目！ 目！ 目！
subtitles.english: Look Flare, look properly, eyes! Eyes! Eyes!

subtitles.original: 仲良くして、仲良く
subtitles.english: Get along, get along

subtitles.original: 嫌って言ってるでしょ、ぺこちゃん
subtitles.english: I said no, Peko-chan

subtitles.original: ねぇ、お願いだって
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm asking you

subtitles.original: 嫌だって、やらないといけない
subtitles.english: I said no, but we have to do it

subtitles.original: もうー、お願い！
subtitles.english: Jeez, please!

subtitles.original: 嫌ー！
subtitles.english: No!

subtitles.original: そして
subtitles.english: And then

subtitles.original: 最後(不穏)の舞台へ
subtitles.english: To the final (unsettling) stage

subtitles.original: 午前二時 踏切に 望遠鏡を 担いでった
subtitles.english: 2 AM at the railroad crossing, I carried my telescope

subtitles.original: ベルトに 結んだ ラジオ 雨は 降らないらしい
subtitles.english: Radio tied to my belt, they said it wouldn't rain

subtitles.original: 二分後 君が来た 大袈裟な 荷物背負ってきた
subtitles.english: Two minutes later, you arrived, carrying an exaggerated amount of luggage

subtitles.original: 始めようか 天体観測 ほうき星を 探して
subtitles.english: Shall we begin our celestial observation, searching for a comet?

subtitles.original: 深い 闇に 飲まれないように 精一杯 歌った
subtitles.english: I sang with all my might so as not to be swallowed by the deep darkness

subtitles.original: 君の 震える 手を 握ろうとした あの日は
subtitles.english: That day when I tried to hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 見えないものを 見ようとして 望遠鏡を...
subtitles.english: Trying to see things that can't be seen, peering through the telescope...
